snippet: Defender DaMarcus Beasley was added as the American team prepared for the knockout stages.
abstract: United States men's soccer coach Jurgen Klinsmann cuts striker Jozy Altidore from team and adds defender DaMarcus Beasley before Gold Cup quarterfinal match; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Defender DaMarcus Beasley was added as the American team prepared for the knockout stages.

headline.main: Jozy Altidore Is Off U.S. Gold Cup Roster
